Transcription for 24268

O'er the earth is gathered round, and in it we live.
Kenook eduladu iru hezun diwa ardh, Kenook horogai zi gadai ramar,
Gorseth dehong lur ein breidh uyd yang mid, Gorseth agwirun erbin abid.
Mid agmrote irail yun ain fothad, Kalon ul skalon ukrir karn gulad,
Tagad galayni baini dada inloidh, Tewa foptayoni dhan utloidh,
